messages.title: A Real Voice for Hedge End in Parliament
messages.content: A real voice for our schools and children, for our NHS, let down by the Conservatives.

messages.title: The Conservative Broken Promise to Hedge End residents
messages.content: The Conservatives won the General Election here two years ago on a promise. A promise to tackle congestion and get missing by-passes for Eastleigh and Botley funded in 100 days.

messages.title: What can we do for YOU?
messages.content: If there are issues you want us to take up, or if you have a problem or an idea or issue you'd like Mike Thornton (your local MP) or your Liberal Democrat team to work on.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Conservative cuts to school funding threaten the quality of teaching in our schools. Pledge to fight to restore funding for our children’s education and get the school places needed.
Thousands of operations have been cancelled due to the Conservatives’ malice. Support for bureaucrats over doctors and ageing population needs.

mentions.candidate: Mike Thornton says: 'The Conservatives have BROKEN their election promise to end traffic misery, with M27 quieter suffering delayed to 2027.'
mentions.tacticalSituation: Lib Dems winning close here, only 569 votes gap in 2015.

issues.education: Pledge to fight to restore funding for our children’s education and get the school places needed.
issues.governance: Claims of a broken promise by Conservatives on congestion and infrastructure.
issues.health: Support for bureaucracy over doctors and ageing population needs.

housing.content: The right local people not just the right houses in the constituency.

leaflet.personalStatement: Three things to remember - Mike Thornton has ten years' experience standing up for Eastleigh.

quotes.text: Chancellor promises more jobs and funding.

images.caption: Mike Thornton - A real voice for Hedge End in Parliament.

leaflet.additionalNotes: Leaflet contains local voting statistics, suggesting a close race between Lib Dem and the Conservative party.
